metadata.title: CVE-2020-25653 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A race condition vulnerability was found in the way the spice-vdagentd daemon handled new client connections. This flaw may allow an unprivileged local guest user to become the active agent for spice-vdagentd, possibly resulting in a denial of service or information leakage from the host. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality as well as system availability. This flaw affects spice-vdagent versions 0.20 and prior.

criterions.comment: spice-vdagent package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.20.0-1ubuntu0.1').
